alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 7:23AM CDT until March 26 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR AUTAUGA AND NORTHEASTERN LOWNDES COUNTIES... At 723 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vida Junction, or 15 miles west of Prattville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prattville, Millbrook, Deatsville, Autaugaville, Booth, Mulberry, Vida Junction, Autauga County Airport and Dawson Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for central, south central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
